While claims it puts off no heat are not valid I love this air fryer. Everything I have cooked in it has come out good. I have found it easy to work and clean.

Received this baby today. My fiancé and I went straight to the grocery store and got fish, potatoes, sweet onions (and we already had kale). I heard there was a chemical smell when first used so I washed the baskets and rack then ran it through 2 cycles of 30 min at 390 degrees, then rinsed again. Seemed to work. No smell or effect on food. Kale chips? Crispy and delicious! Onion rings?? My refound love! Fried fish? Crispy on the outside and flakey inside! Fries from fresh potatoes? Delish but time consuming. I may never cook on my stove again!!! ❤️❤️❤️

We bought this air oven for ourselves and two more for family members at Christmas. Everyone absolutely loves this thing!!! We've tried various vegetables (frozen and fresh) as well as different types and cuts of meat and have been pleased with all results. Nice not having to deal with all the oil (as well as healthier) and love how easy it is to clean!!

Been using it since purchasing this. Air fryers are coming out probably every week and they're all effective. They normally come in 3.7qt or 6qt. Size.basically a small or large. I needed a midpoint one and this is the only one I've found. Really good price point as well. I'd recommend this to everyone. Picture is attached for size reference. I can probably fit about 4-5 boneless chicken thighs...10mins on each side and I got a fried chicken!

We have had this Secura Hot Air Fryer several weeks now and it helped me and my husband lose a lot of weight- 25lb actually, so far. We are cooking lots of veggies using it and find them to be far more delicious than any other method. So thank you for this invention. I am sure there are many other models - this one does not have a digital screen but really is working very very well.

I like this better than I thought I would. It's awesome for any kind of potato, whether you want to make frozen fries or use fresh potatoes. It's way faster than a toaster oven and makes them really crispy. I've also used it for homemade chicken breast tenders and it worked great. It's also my new favorite way to make bacon. The whole thing is very easy to clean as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: My only mistake is that I should have purchased it sooner!
reviews.reviewText: This air fryer exceeded all of my expectations. I LIKE IT! It is extremely easy to use, doesn't take up much space, and everything that I have cooked in it has turned out PERFECT! I made my Dad air fried turkey wings and he loved them so much, he immediately ordered one. Purchase this air fryer, you will NOT be disappointed.

Well I can't compare brands because I haven't used another airfryer but I am simply amazed at the versatility and convenience of this appliance. I use it almost everyday. I have cooked a pork roast in 20 minutes with small potatoes on the side and it was delicious. I have made cauliflower "steaks" that were perfect. Even hot dogs or frozen pretzels can be cooked up in this beauty. Buy it! The model I have is large enough for several servings but even a small one would be useful!

Bang for the buck, you cannot beat this unit. I have friends that went for the bells and whistles, digital & pushbutton models, but the important thing is the 1500 watts. Like others have said, shaking the basket or turning your food every 5 - 15 minutes depending on what is being prepared makes for even golden brown cooking. Very simple to use and time / temp settings both become intuitive after the first few uses. Start with fries and nuggets to get the feel for the settings and you are on your way to steaks and seafood.

I use this gem almost every week. It fries frozen-to-fresh food in minutes without oil smell and added calories. I put away my deep fryer months ago and I don't miss it. The only thing I can't fry in this is food with wet batter like beer batter and fresh dough, but I would rarely make those dishes so this little "flaw" doesn't bother me. I recommend this device to everyone.

reviews.reviewTitle: It is so quick and easy to cook with and cleanup is a breeze.
reviews.reviewText: I love, love, love this fryer. I make “naked“ fried chicken which comes out crispy without any added fat or flour. Or use a little egg bath and roll catfish in spiced corn meal and make a really delicious fried catfish with no added fat. It is so quick and easy to cook with and cleanup is a breeze. Even my husband, who never would’ve tried this if I had told him how I cooked it, loves the food I cook in it.

Wow you can cook anything in this thing and my husband is now obsessed! I'm talking everything from frozen snacks to burgers to grilled cheese. Everything turns out crisp and perfect. Highly recommend!

I purchased this air fryer brand based on reviews. So far I'm delighted with it. I made stuffed chicken breast yesterday and they were browned nicely on the outside, moist and juicy on the inside. Also made sweet potato fries the night before and they were delicious. It's a very efficient way to cook for two people, plus healthier without the added oils.

reviews.reviewTitle: Absolutely great product by reliable company
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this machine. Really makes chicken crispy in 17 minutes even using almond flour. Still experimenting with settings, turned my pizza into meteorites but that’s me and not the machine. I trust this brand name because I have other appliances from this company that I love and use all the time. Very reliable!

The food cooked in here tasted wonderful the only problem with this oven is since I received it in February I had to return it in July due to it rusting in the bottom of the oven and I was concerned that it would rust through , maybe a design issue, otherwise it cooks like a charm.

This appliance fits right in with a healthy Keto lifestyle, doesn't heat up my kitchen, cooks food faster, reheats and does everything better than any other appliance i have used in the past and it is affordable. It doesn't get much better! Get yours today.

reviews.reviewTitle: Below expectations which were based on the Amazon reviews. ...
reviews.reviewText: Below expectations which were based on the Amazon reviews ... not enough circulation to the bottom area due to not enough space for air to circulate..the sides have a different opening than the bottom....and I'm sure they did some research....but in MY KITCHEN....this one didn't work out for me.....not enough air circulation......

Had a family member recommend this product. I have cooked a NY Strip (medium in 12 minutes), chickens wings (perfect in 22 minutes)
Frying basket has a drip tray, will accommodate a whole chicken with room to spare, basket is dishwasher friendly as well.

A lot of my friends were getting air fryers and so I wanted to try one out. I LOVE THIS! We have used it so much in the past two weeks! It's small and compact so once we use it we put it away in the cabinet. Easy to clean and very easy to use! So much faster instead of using our oven! Food cooks well and we've done everything from chicken, to fried pickles and even fries and biscuits.

reviews.reviewTitle: Stopped working after less than 1 year
reviews.reviewText: I initially loved my air fryer! It stopped working in Dec 2018 and I purchased in March of 2018. I have the paper work that shows it has a 2 year warranty but I have not been able to reach anyone to get assistance. Hopefully with this review someone will contact me to replace my air fryer. This is the reason I have given it 2 stars.

I have had this product for months now, and I am absolutely obsessed! I have air-fried everything from veggies, to salmon, to burgers, grilled cheese and leftovers! Literally just throw anything in there and try it for yourself! I hardly use my oven anymore. Perfect for those who live alone or cook for one!
basket is too small to cook for 3

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice unit, but the manual that comes with the unit is terrible!
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice Hot Air fryer, however the manual that came with the unit has a very few recipes in it and does not have a recipe for the skewer device that came with it. Gives you absolutely no tips on how to use this. Does not specify if you can do wings frozen or if you have to thaw them first. I did them frozen and they cooked but were not what I expected. I have done frozen french fries and they came out great. I contacted Secura about the cooking issues I have described but have not heard back from them. I have also purchased a hot air fryer cookbook that has more recipes as well.

3 month Update: We have used this fryer to make fries, but it is no different from a conventional oven. It bakes your food instead of giving the food an authentic crispy taste. We use exactly as instructed and it has not impressed any of with how it “fries.”

I have been wanting an air fryer for awhile but do I need another small appliance?
I am glad I bought it. I really use it everyday! I make everything from baked potatoes to toasted English muffins in this. Don’t expect to get the same texture as deep frying but you will get a nice alternative to frying.

I really expected that this would be another of those appliances that are over-hyped. I've only used it for 2 things so far: french fries and grilled cheese. I'm sold. It did a great job on both. Super easy to use and to clean.
Love this air fryer. Works perfect for french fries, chicken strips etc. I have lots of food to try and am looking forward to it.

This is making my life so much easier! I got rid of two old big kitchen items (a Nu Wave Oven and rotisserie) to make room for this one. So far, I have used it for bacon, fried pickles, fried avocados, fried okra and chicken fries. Quick and easy and the clean up is not too bad either. I purchased a little keto air fryer cookbook to use with it as well. It's straightforward and simple to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: If you like heating up frozen goods, this is PERFECT!
reviews.reviewText: We've used this thing for frozen burritos, taquitoes, fries, chicken nuggets, fish sticks, you name it. EVERYTHING tastes SOO much better than anything we could ever do in the oven! Just buy it! Easily cleaned, I just hose it out, lightly scrub and let it dry until the next use. I'm sure it could easily survive a trip through the dish washer!

reviews.reviewTitle: this has been easy to use and clean up
reviews.reviewText: So far, this has been easy to use and clean up. I wish the literature that came with it included more recipes / suggestions. One thing to keep in mind - if you buy skinless / boneless chicken parts (like I do), don't try to "fry" it with a flour and egg wash coating. You will have to remember to buy chicken WITH skin if you are looking for tasty (un)fried chicken. Duh.

reviews.reviewTitle: This air fryer is wonderful. Our family eats different things at different times ...
reviews.reviewText: This air fryer is wonderful. Our family eats different things at different times and it has made our life easier. It's quick and you can do such a variety of foods in this air fryer. The cleanup is also super easy. The only reason I didn't give this a five is that it would have been great if the time setting would have been digital and not a knob. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for "easy" in the kitchen.

reviews.reviewTitle: but this is great, I use it at least 3x's a week ...
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant in buying yet a nothing kitchen Item that I would only use once or twice...but this is great, I use it at least 3x's a week or more. I basically have only cooked chicken in it (we eat a lot of chicken) but it turns out so good...better than the oven or microwave!!! Holds enough to feed three, I count my husband as 2 people LOL!!

reviews.reviewTitle: I bought my first one a year ago.
reviews.reviewText: September of '17 I bought this exact model. As of this weekend it has died on me. Well worth the money and I got almost daily use out of it as this coupled with a double hotplate are my main means of cooking. I"m about to buy it again but just know that mine lasted for a little over a year.

reviews.reviewTitle: Where’s this been all my life??
reviews.reviewText: Simple to use. Cooks fast, no oil needed. Amazing for leftover pizza - crust stays crisp, tastes like it was just delivered. Easy cleanup- just throw basket in dishwasher if need but the non stick coating can be just wiped clean.

We use this almost every day. The basket holds a lot and makes delicious fries, heats up things we used to microwave like chimichangas and makes them taste crispy and delicious, unlike the soggy microwaved ones. It is perfect for the two of us. Easy to clean and fast to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: I like this one better than my last one
reviews.reviewText: I like this one better than my last one. It is less flashy but heats up faster and has a manual heat control and timer. I also prefer that the inside area is not round! It seems to fit more odd shaped foods.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is a great air fryer
reviews.reviewText: This is a great air fryer. It does not get hot on my counter top, which thing I really like about it. The fact that it comes with a rack is awesome. I can cook meat on top and vegetables on the bottom. It's great for feeding two people, though I have also stretched it to cook for three a time or two.

reviews.reviewTitle: New Major Appliance in My Kitchen
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this! Makes food taste so much better than cooking in my oil fryer and so much healthier too! My family was very sceptical when I told them I "fried" the finger steaks, chicken nuggets and fries WITHOUT oil. I had to physically show them because they would never have known otherwise!

reviews.reviewTitle: High quality, easy to use, and a great price!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love my air fryer! We make the best burgers that are so juicy! My husband wasn’t a believer and now he asks me to airfry our burgers haha! Fries, mini-apple pies, chicken, mozzarella sticks, fish, eggs, veggies, you name it, I’ve air fried in this! Been going strong since I bought it nearly 2 years ago!
Works as expected, only complaint would be some sort of guide to help translate cooking times from conventional oil fryers. Food ends up crispy and cooks relatively quickly.

This thing is AMAZING. I logged on to Amazon and typed in "Air Fryer" only to be overwhelmed with the choices of sizes, brands, prices and such. I am very happy with this one that I chose by "Secura". I went with the XL since it was for me, my husband and two kids and boy am I glad I did. It makes amazing french fries.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent product - until it stopped working
reviews.reviewText:
Couldn't have asked for more initially - rapid heating time, excellent performance.

But after about 6 months, it stopped working. No idea why, but it simply doesn't power on anymore even when I tried all the troubleshooting steps in the user manual. Stuck a shame, would've been a fantastic long-term product in the kitchen.

reviews.reviewTitle: My wife loves it. We have rarely use our ...
reviews.reviewText: My wife loves it. We have rarely use our regular oven lately. She has cooked so many things thing in it I was worried she would wear it out. From Asian Dumplins, Sausage, Bacon, Egg Rolls, Chicken (raw and prepped frozen parts) to Biscuits. Literally no oil on 90 percent of foods.

reviews.reviewTitle: ... with a hot air fryer and I am very pleased with it's performance
reviews.reviewText: This is my first experience with a hot air fryer and I am very pleased with it's performance. I have used it to cook french fries, frozen spring rolls, frozen vegan sausage patties and English muffins among other things, I haven't used any oil or oil spray and everything has turned out very well, I don't ever want to be without one, also the included rack really adds to the versatility.
Fryer delivered 4/5/2018, stopped working 6/5/2018. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. JUNK.

reviews.reviewTitle: Secura has good reviews on you tube!
reviews.reviewText: Just got mine tonight. Already made chicken and french fries. I was on the fence for MONTHS! So happy I decided to try this one. Basket his large enough for small chicken and that will be next! I'll keep you updated when I try shrimp tomorrow night!

Super easy to use. I made chicken nuggets in less than 10 minutes from start to finish. Usually using an oven, you have to wait for it preheat, then cook the nuggets for about 15 minutes and then the kitchen is hot and you have to clean a pan. But with this it's so fast and quick and super easy clean up. I love it! Can't wait to use it for making many more types of foods.

Even after reading all the positive reviews, I was still a little skeptical about how air fried food would fit in our meal plans. And it is Fantastic! From home made French fries, fresh vegetables, sirloin steak to frozen breaded chicken patties and chimichongas -- all easy and delicious! I love the karger size of the basket -- very family friendly.

I needed to practice with it. It is really easy to use. I didn't realize that if you used it with precooked food that you didn't need to cook the entire time that was suggested in the booklet. I really like the dishwasher safe feature for the basket, etc.

Absolutely love this air fryer! So easy to use and easy clean up! Much easier and quicket than heating up the oven and waiting for cook time and healthier than frying. With the air fryer it is quick and easy! Great for my teens and tweens that like to make quick convenience food. Kabob rack worked great for cooking chicken and pepper kabobs! Highy recommend
Don’t recommend. The air fry food taste totally different oil fry.

Recently started a keto diet and wanted something to cook meat in without the wait. I’ve made steak and wings so far and they’re amazing. If you’re wanting to buy an air fryer, but don’t want to break the bank, get this one!!

reviews.reviewTitle: It works best if you only put things on the rack
reviews.reviewText:
We are loving this air fryer. It makes frozen foods so much crispier. Fried pickles have been a hit. The customer service has been outstanding!

My only tiny complaint is that the rack it ships with is poorly designed. It really cuts into the surface area of the cooking in the basket below because of where the feet are. It works best if you only put things on the rack, not underneath also I think.

this thing is amazing I never thought you could get that crispy of food using any oil at all! I made potato pancakes in them and they were wonderful cook through and very crispy. It is amazing how versatile it is and how quickly it Cooks definitely worth the money!
Absolutely love it!!! I can't wait to try more recipe with this, you use very little oil which is great for my husband. I also have the instant Pot, but I rather cook with this.

Got this for my Dad for his birthday. He absolutely loves it. He loves cooking frozen fries in it instead of using deep fryer now. That’s like all he eats. So far that’s all we’ve made in it, but got the book to make more stuff.

Was a gift for my in laws. I did research forever and read all the reveiws. I decided on this one (price was fair) and they love it! They cook everything in it! They thank us for it about once a week lol.

I was so Pleased at how well it cooked the food I normally deep fried. It took less time and was just as crispy. I highly recommend it for anyone that wants to eat healthier. The clean up is so easy and there is no splattered oil to clean up.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works well and is a quiet system.
reviews.reviewText: I have only used it a few times with fries and chicken tenders and everything tastes wonderful. No oil needed so its healthier. I would suggest checking on cooking times as mine cooks a little faster than suggested times.
Been using this for a couple months and it's a great addition to the kitchen. I really like the way it heats up leftovers vs the microwave, things will get crisp again, not soggy.
I have been using it for few time now it does the job. when its on it smells. like plastic is burning. but so far its fine.

Love this air fryer! Everything I'm cooking is coming out great! It also cooks really quickly. The adjustments are very simple to use. I like that it doesn't get the kitchen hot like the oven. Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: The manufacturer commented on the review below
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Frozen fries had to be shifted many times in basket to cook, still uneven cooking on them. Not that impressed so far.

reviews.reviewTitle: This works really well and is very simple and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This works really well and is very simple and easy to use. One of my favorite things to make is a "grilled" cheese sandwich. So delicious. Potatoes in the form of fries, roasted, spiralized or wedges are fantastic! Perfect size for our family of 3.

I have used this to make bagels several times (delicious and easy!) and will be making breaded chicken tonight. I have also made crunchy chick peas, a great snack with many possibilities for seasonings.....
Very happy with this product- easy to use, easy to clean!
I used to make Buffalo Wings, Fried Cauliflower and a few other things. They food cane out crispy and delicious.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best small appliance I have ever bought!
reviews.reviewText: I love this! It is good for a batch of fries or enough wings for a single person or a snack for several, it isn't big but it is awesome! We have made, wings, fries, frozen waffles, pizza rolls...

reviews.reviewTitle: Still need to use oil but not as much as regular frying.
reviews.reviewText: It may be me, but I don't like spraying oil all over the food to get it crispy and brown. Fresh veggies turn out good. I'll try some more recipes, but I'm not too impressed with air fryers in general.
Best gift ever. We can make a full meal without heating up the oven. I cannot even taste the difference of air vs oil frying
Changed how we eat. Takes up a good amount of space on the counter but it's worth it. Everyday we look forward to seeing what new and exciting things we can cook in it

reviews.reviewTitle: I especially like the way tater-tots
reviews.reviewText: I have cooked just about everything I can think of in this thang! I especially like the way tater-tots, salmon, frozen fries, frozen egg-rolls, and even frozen biscuits cook in it. Not crazy about cooking steak in it though...Quick & easy....Easy clean-up too.
Very pleased with this air fryer. Simple to use and tofu, potatoes, chickpeas come out tasting so good.
Have not used much yet because food is not cooked as expected

reviews.reviewTitle: Second air fryer owned / quiet / dependable / easy clean
reviews.reviewText: Enjoying new air fryer, quieter than previous one purchased. Last fryer corroded by release handle, hoping this one holds up. So far very dependable, quiet, larger basket size.

Bought this for my husband and he loves it. So far we have only made a couple batches of fries. Can't wait to try some veggies in it.
It's easy to use and clean. The easy cleaning part is awesome. A little smell (not too bad) with first use, no smell after.

We are really loving our new Secure air fryer. Cooks our food well done. Very easy clean up! We cooked two large baked potatoes on 390 degrees for 40 minuets. When finished added butter and bacon bits, very delicious! Highly recommend this Air fryer!
Love this airfryer! I use it all the time, and it works very well and is easy to clean. It is large though so you'll need a big space for it

I love this air fryer. frozen foods cook quickly and come out crispy. It is wonderful for reheating breaded items that that would not be very good reheated in the microwave.This appliance will stay on my counter as it will get lots of use.
Awesome fryer! I had to practice with it, but I am getting the hang of it. Great size basket!

I really like this air fryer. Not only is the basket large, the machine is very quiet. I cook everything in it now. I think this is the best air fryer on the market. It even comes with a tray to stack things on.
Very easy to clean. Cooks fast. Had to try it a couple of times to get my setting and timer right. I really like the way it cooks the chicken.

I use it to make my chicken and they taste amazing. My chicken is not dry and really look like it was fried.
It can easily make dinner for 3-4 people.
Can also make french fries. Just spray a little oil on top to void dryness and voila!

reviews.reviewTitle: I like convection ovens a lot (that's what this really is)
reviews.reviewText: I like convection ovens a lot (that's what this really is), but this a bit smaller and cheaper than a full fledged counter-top convection oven. I got a bigger air fryer so I could cook in batches and this unit does it well. Actually big enough to reheat a slice of Costco pizza.
Great product for the price, does the job as described. I am very impressed by the frying quality for French fries.

reviews.reviewTitle: Awesome product. It crisps items much better and faster ...
reviews.reviewText: Awesome product. It crisps items much better and faster than a table top oven. I use it way more often than I originally expected because of the convenience and quality of the cook!
Was a gift. But happy with the product.

YES! It does work for food prep with Crohn's. It takes some getting used to and learning to cook various foods, but it's the most variety (and CRUNCH) we've had since the diagnosis.

Thank God for technology.

reviews.reviewTitle: Eliminating the need for cooking oil is a great thing, especially when it cooks French Fries and ...
reviews.reviewText: Eliminating the need for cooking oil is a great thing, especially when it cooks French Fries and chicken with a crispy result. So far so good. Will update after trying to cook more food items.

Just got this a couple of weeks ago, so don’t know about durability yet. But love it so far. Truly crispy “fries” and hash browns. Cooked fish perfectly. And it’s fast. I chose this brand (which I’d never heard of) based on reviews, so I thought I’d weigh in as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: no recipes attached and no user manual sent
reviews.reviewText: Can't use product without instructions and receipes

reviews.reviewTitle: It makes the best roasted vegetables
reviews.reviewText: Bought myself one of these about 6 months ago. It makes the best roasted vegetables! I have since bought one for my daughter for her birthday and my niece and nephew for Christmas. They are a hit!
Shipped promptly in perfect conditions! Super easy to use. Great for quick meals. So far I’m stuck on corndogs and pretzels!! Perfect for chicken, corn nuggets you name it! Highly recommend
Finally, crispy food on all sides like burritos, fries,etc. Cooked a small bacon wrapped steak nicely also. Larger basket than many others. Very easy to use and clean.
hard to figure out time and temps as to how they are marked. Button to release basket needs work, can not clean under it and it gets dirty under it FAST.

I have had this for a few days and it seems to work well. I wanted to cook my own chicken wings amongst other things. Wings in the oven just aren't that good. I put them in the plain and they are good and crispy. I made my own fries and they tasted better then the store bought ones. So far the machine didn't disappoint.
Works great and hubby loves it!
I hear so much about air fryer that I had to get one . I love it saves time for me . Food is moist I’m get a cook book so see what else I can do.
Easy to use, clean and frys great bacon with no spatter mess.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great fryer with a lot of room and food comes out good.
reviews.reviewText: If you don't clean it right away it will have a different taste from previous cooking but overall it has worked great for us
very good quality, the food comes out perfectly, we haven't had any issues with it. Its very easy to use and the end results are very pleasing and tasty.

It's like my own little easy-bake oven, but it cooks faster than my standard oven and doesn't use gas! When I cook barbecue chicken it cooks fast, evenly and even browns the meat on top, while leaving the chicken juicy! It smells and tastes like it was almost grilled!!
Works as described easy to use... it does have a slight odor I'm hoping that will go away in time... but over all I like it

reviews.reviewTitle: Great air fryer works well gets the foods crispy great ...
reviews.reviewText: Great air fryer works well gets the foods crispy great for french fries brought home from fast food eateries fried mushrooms, fried pickles anything fried is great haven't tried hot dogs or raw meats

Got this for my daughter for Christmas and has just gotten around to trying and so far she is very happy with it takes a little practice to get the right time for but once you do the food tasted great.

reviews.reviewTitle: this thing is downright awesome. No more gross smelly oil in the house
reviews.reviewText: Crispy wings, crispy french fries, crispy fish and chips, this thing is downright awesome. No more gross smelly oil in the house. I wish i discovered this earlier. I can't wit to try new recipes in this thing.
Awesome product! Great value, have used it daily since it arrived and am happily air frying!!!! Lives up to expectations and works very well. Food comes out crunchy and tasty!
Works great and cooks anything really easily and quickly.
Love this product. Works great. Whatever I air fry in this comes out great and juicy. Keep finding new things to air fry.
Best thing I ever bought!! Making chicken parmesan without oil!! French fries!! Roasted veggies, and on and on. Easy clean up too. This size is great for two people. Highly recommend
Does everything it is supposed to. Good size capacity, well packaged. Fries, breaded fish, etc., come out just right.
I have cooked this three times. It did great with chicken tenders, French fries and sweet potato fries. It is healthier and the food taste great. I highly reccommend this product.
Works great for chicken and steak and fries. So far we have not tried it with anything else. It doesn’t get super hot, which is good. It is also very easy to clean.
Love this fryer. Nice size basket. Preferred square basket vs. round.
I love this product easy to use and easy to clean. Food is great, too.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's ok. A toaster oven works just as well ...
reviews.reviewText: It's ok. A toaster oven works just as well. Not really what I would call a fryer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Im very happy with my air fryer
reviews.reviewText: Im very happy with my air fryer, it was delivered on time, ive bought 3 of them to give to my friends and they are extremely happy with the Secura air fryer.

This Air Fryer is awesome!!! Very easy to use and a much better price than it's competitors! It works just the same!! I love it and will be using it daily! I love that it also comes with the rack for kabobs!! Such a cool addition that I feel many others don't have!
It was a gift but it is everything it was advertise to be.....GREAT!!!
We LOVE this air fryer. It has been amazing. I have cooked chicken breast, pork tenderloin, pizza rolls, chicken wings... This machine is better priced than most and worth ever penny!
Good initial cookbook and especially does precooked items good. Still experimenting with raw but like it so far.
Was lots of fun, chicken legs turned out really well!

Cooking one item like tater tots is great.
When I want to do a hamburger patty also timing doesn’t work so good.

reviews.reviewTitle: It cooks really fast and everything gets nice and crispy
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as a gift for my daughter and she loves it. It cooks really fast and everything gets nice and crispy. It also has a larger frying area than most other units I had looked at.
Great air fryer at a really good price for this size. Very easy to use, and holds enough food to feed a couple of people.
Works great. Very easy to use and clean.

reviews.reviewTitle: This air fryer is highly recommended
reviews.reviewText: One more appliance that you really need to get. Works well, priced well, and easy to use. Cooks things very well.

reviews.reviewTitle: I love this little air fryer
reviews.reviewText: I love this little air fryer! I wanted a bigger one originally but I'm glad I didn't bother. This one was budget friendly and plenty big for two people.

I have not had enough opportunity to explore the device's versatility but it pays for itself in my eyes just by how well it delivers "fried" potatoes without fat. Chunks of potato or sweet potato prepared in the air fryer are excellent. You may rub a little oil on the potatoes but it isn't necessary.

Clean-up -- always an issue with countertop / specialized appliances -- is a snap. The cooking basket dissembles for cleaning with the push of one button. The cooking area is a particularly tough and effective nonstick surface. A breeze to wash.

Bear in mind that the cooking capacity is not large -- enough to "fry up" four or five potatoes.

This is now the #1 way I cook. Choose this because it's one of the few models with a mechanical spring timer, not an LED/buttons, more electronics to break.

Also choose this because it's a full 4.1 L and not 3.3 L like most units this size. In other words, this unit can hold content in a "square" 4.1 L liter size. To compare, draw a circle inside that square, and THAT'S the capacity/shape/size of others. I definitely appreciate the extra space! It looked almost too big in the pictures, but it's not. Can get 4 half-lbs burger patties in at once, or two chicken quarters in. Can't do that with anything smaller!

reviews.reviewTitle: Would purchase again......if reliable, will recomend to anyone.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 2 of these. One was given as a gift. So far I have cooked, a fresh hamburger, tater tots, breaded fish filets, and some fresh sweet potato fries. everything except the sweet potatoes came out great. Very hot, very fast. be sure to shake halfway through the loose items that sit on top of each other.....great for cooking these frozen items, when not wanting to heat up the big oven and whole house. Also, no pre heating needed. So far, I love it.....

After hearing all the hype about air fryers, I decided to purchase one. Upon receiving the fryer, I was disappointed to learn that no cooking instructions or user manual were provided. I am now left trying to Google and guess my way through using this product.

I waited a little while to try this out before giving a review. So far, I've made fries, onion rings, shrimp, burgers, egg rolls, etc. Things that are meant to be fried come out great. Was a little leery of doing burgers, but, both hamburg and chicken burgers came out great. I used a little spray for chicken burger so it wouldn't be too dry. Came out crispy on outside and tender inside. The manual comes with a chart for what temps to put everything on and it covers quite a bit. I've found that the times sometimes need to be adjusted though. Just get a meat thermometer to test everything before you eat. There's always a learning curve with new appliances and this is no exception. I would give this a 4 1/2 stars, but, you can't do half a star on here.
A little tip: use a small piece of tin foil in bottom of basket to help cut down on cleanup...huge time saver! Don't let it go up the sides though or it will interfere with airflow that cooks your food. If you're looking for something small for 1 or 2 people, this isn't it. It's pretty big on your counter. Bigger than a toaster & smaller than a microwave, if that helps.
Will be trying roasting and baking next and will update when I do. Found some cupcake tins at dollar store that I can cut to size for baking.

This air fryer is fantastic! I’ve cooked several things in it including this little mini pizza, which took only about 10 minutes to cook. Tasted wonderful! I’ve also made “fried” cube steak and roasted Italian style vegetable. My husband thought the steak was wonderful and without grease! It seemed so strange to be cooking fried steak and NOT standing by the stove watching the grease fry the food! I kept going back and checking every so often and turned it over once. And at the end, there was zero grease to clean up! Not only is this fryer healthier in preparation of food, it is easy to use, and the food is delicious. What more could you want?

reviews.reviewTitle: Defective Coating on Basket - Caveat Emptor!
reviews.reviewText:
Brand new, just out of the box, never been plugged in or cleaned. The photos accompanying this review speak for themselves, and they say: "No Quality Control!"

The coating appears to have been applied over a dirty surface, with metal shavings present. Bits of coating fell off onto the counter top when I removed the inner basket from its plastic bag. To be fair, I've bought other Secura products and they have arrived with no imperfections, and have given fine service. I can't understand how they could let something like this out of the factory and inflict it upon a customer. So disappointing...

reviews.reviewTitle: You absolutely will not go wrong with the Secura! Believe me when I say, I've done your research for you!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE my Secura Airfryer ! ! I keep it on top of my stove and use it nearly every day ! Today, I roasted hot dogs ! Today, I sprayed breaded okra with olive oil and airfried them for 24 min. to perfection! [Tho fresh from the farmers market and home lightly breaded is the cats meow!] That's just today ! I can't recommend the Secura more strongly ~ Absolutely, I have recommended it to any and everyone who'll listen ! !

reviews.reviewTitle: Solid and well made...they LOVE it!
reviews.reviewText:
This was a Christmas gift for my daughter and her family. They LOVE it!!!! Even though it was out of stock and they didn't get it until after Christmas... it was worth the wait. It's the perfect size...not to big and not to small and it comes with the extra's you have to buy with other
machines. It was also the only one that had a 2 year product warranty...must mean they believe in their product...I liked that and that is why I
waited until after Christmas for it to arrive...I could have canceled and ordered a different brand.
This is my review...I did not get the product for free...nor did I get anything else for it...just so you know.

reviews.reviewTitle: So many uses, great price, and easy to clean!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely LOVE our Secura hot air fryer! I use it to make crispy french fries, roasted corn on the cob, brussel sprouts, hamburgers (yes, I said hamburgers!), donuts, cookies, rhubarb apple crisp, and pastry wrapped double stuffed oreos (a decadent county fair-type treat!) Plus it is super easy to clean. This unit has earned a much coveted permanent spot on our counter top, because we use it so often. We have purchased two more for our adult children because we love ours so much. My absolute highest recommendation!!
returned it, Grand daughter bought me one

reviews.reviewTitle: Well constructed and looks great. Instructions that came with it were easy to ...
reviews.reviewText: This fryer was as advertised. Well constructed and looks great. Instructions that came with it were easy to follow and very helpful. Never having used one of these before, I was able to produce some excellent results with the first few items I tried in it. Bacon, wings and fries were superb. It is so easy to use and the clean-up is a breeze. A great tool for cooking something when you are short on time, like coming home from work, pop something in the fryer and it is done by the time I finish changing clothes and cleaning up. Highly recommend this unit.
the numbers on the dial are SO small you need a magnifying glass to read them.

We used this air fryer maybe once a week for easy stuff.... Then it just totally stopped working 5 minutes into cooking chicken wings. Let it cool down and tried to finish what we started and it was dead.

I bought it last December 2017 during one of the promotions. It works as described by many reviewers. Pretty much anything you can cook in a conventional oven, you can air fry.

Only concern. It has a small, push button micro switch that engages when you push the pan into the fryer. (It must be some sort of interlock??) Unfortunately, the micro switch is rather flimsy so I often have to push it in several times to get it to engage. I'd give it 5 stars if it wasn't for this issue.

I just received this!! Looks really easy and not too huge!!! I can't wait to use it and will update my review on how it works! I already know it is going to be easy to clean. So much better than that huge heavy one that I have had.

I absolutely love this machine, but after only about a year of having it it has officially stopped working. This makes me really sad because this is probably one of my favorite kitchen gadgets ever. I want to buy another one but I'm scared to buy this exact one now.

reviews.reviewTitle: ... my husband who is constantly frying food and I HATE the oil smell
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my husband who is constantly frying food and I HATE the oil smell! This has been great!! He can still fry the food and get crispy food without the added fat and there is almost no smell! This larger unit can hold a lot and can even cook a cake, which we have not tried yet.

reviews.reviewTitle: product arrived on time as works as described, still ...
reviews.reviewText: product arrived on time as works as described , still learning what I can fry healthier . so far have used it on Fries,shrimp and to warm up leftover pizza tonight it will be Naan bread pizza
we keep finding more and more ways to use it

reviews.reviewTitle: ... this as a wedding gift and I am in love with it
reviews.reviewText: We received this as a wedding gift and I am in love with it. I am constantly trying to think of things to cook in it. It creates a great crisp to anything you cook in it. So much better than baking and so much healthier than frying. Wings, chicken tenders, potatoes all came out great!

reviews.reviewTitle: It cooks fast and without oil
reviews.reviewText: Loves how it cooks fries and chicken fingers A little small. Have family of 4 and cooks for 2
I am so glad we purchased one of these! It's perfect and cooks your food just right! It does smell odd the first few times you use it but once you break it in, the smell goes away.

reviews.reviewTitle: Air Fryer Replaced The Grease In Our Household.....

I could not be any happier then I am with this air fryer!
Purchased for self, and for family. Very pleased.
I love this kitchen gadget!

The Secura Air Fryer gets far more use in our family than the microwave. After two and a half years the auto-shutoff stopped working, so we use the kitchen timer instead. No complaints - don't want to replace it.

qAndA.question: If the fat of the food splashes the top of the fryer, with which detergent can be cleaned?
qAndA.answer: you can use any soft cleaner.

qAndA.question: Does the basket go back in without cooling once you pull it out to turn the food?
qAndA.answer: Yes it does.

qAndA.question: does the food crisp on all 4 sides or just on the top and sides??
qAndA.answer: Every once in awhile, I'll take the basket out and shake it so the food flips around. It seems to crisp all around. For fries or sonething that I want more crisper, I spritz a little oil on it.

qAndA.question: secura electric hot air fryer model: txg-ds14. my question: is the pan and the basket suppose to come apart? if so, how do i separate them?
qAndA.answer: Yes the parts come apart on the handle, pull toward you the clear button.

qAndA.question: Can you cook fish in this?
qAndA.answer: In the directions I believe they give a recipe. I am too lazy to look it up so I just took a couple tilapia fillets, dunk in milk and then into fish breading. Put into preheated fryer - didn't use rack - for about 10 minutes, half way through I turned the fish. They were delicious. Now, I am sure if I had used a r… see more

qAndA.question: How does it cook chicken wings. Are they crisoy?
qAndA.answer: Wings were pretty crispy but you can't crowd the basket & need to turn them.

qAndA.question: can you cook a 4lb roast beef in it?
qAndA.answer: It'll roast a whole chicken. . . I believe you could. . . .Max on the timmer is 60 min. May have to re-set for more time. I haven't done this yet. Regardless. . . I think you'll love the machine.
